description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In Asphalt Jungle you have to build a solid road for a car by rotating existing road fields. Your goal is to let the car drive along the road as long as possible. (V1.6)
description.short: In Asphalt Jungle you have to build a solid road for a car by rotating existing road fields. Your goal is to let the car drive along the road as long as possible. (V1.6)
